description: She's been in a relationship with Karl Cook for almost a year. And on Wednesday, her current beau was snapped getting a hug from her ex boyfriend and Big Bang Theory co-star Johnny Galecki.
title: Kaley Cuoco's boyfriend Karl Cook gets hug from her ex
title_page: Kaley Cuoco's boyfriend Karl Cook gets hug from her ex | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's been in a relationship with equestrian Karl Cook for almost a year.
And on Wednesday, Kaley Cuoco's current beau was snapped getting a big hug from her ex boyfriend and Big Bang Theory co-star Johnny Galecki while visiting the set.
Kaley, 31, and Johnny dated for two years before they ended their romantic relationship in winter 2009.
No hard feelings: Kaley Cuoco's boyfriend Karl Cook got a hug from her ex Johnny Galecki while visiting The Big Bang Theory set on Wednesday
The actress shared a photo of Johnny, 41, as he playfully reached for a kiss while being enveloped in Karl's arms on her Instagram.
Kaley captioned the cheeky photo: 'Ummmm then this happened,' jokingly adding: '@sanctionedjohnnygalecki get off my man!'
Soon after, Kaley shared a sweet picture to her Instagram as she smooched a grinning Karl while on the Big Bang Theory set.
She wrote: 'Can you tell I love when this guy comes to visit me at work?'
Glowing: The 31-year-old actress has been in a relationship with equestrian Karl Cook for almost a year; pictured at the Critics' Choice Awards in Santa Monica on December 11
So in love: Soon after, Kaley shared a sweet photo as she smooched a grinning Karl while on the Big Bang Theory set
The blonde star also welcomed Karl's family to the Big Bang Theory set.
She called them 'the cutest guests ever to grace this couch' on Instagram.
Kaley plays Penny Hofstadter - the onscreen wife of Johnny's character Leonard on the hit TV series.
Happy: The blonde star also welcomed Karl's family to the Big Bang Theory set
The Big Bang Theory debuted in September 2007 and is currently in the 10th season.
Kaley and Karl, 26, became an item in spring 2016; they 'met at a horse show,' according to her interview on The Talk in September.
During her appearance on the show, she added: 'I finally found my horse guy. I know it was meant to be. Amazing equestrian and great human. We share, obviously, our passion for horses and dogs and all that.'
Kaley was previously married to tennis professional Ryan Sweeting; they wed in December 2013 and finalized their divorce in 2016.
Having a blast: Karl posted a photo with his family and girlfriend Kaley during their set visit to her TV show
